ISSUE.TITLE: Add resource name to launch wizard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY When launching a JT/WFJT/etc, it would be nice to display the name of the resource that you're launching in the wizard. Right now we display: `Prompts`
